item.description:
Please RSVP only through EventBrite (meetup.com RSVPs are closed for this event): http://elasticsearchbostonnlphackday.eventbrite.com/


This event is organized by the Elasticsearch Boston meetup group. A full hackday at hack/reduce where NLP/ML is the topic and folks get to work hands-on with Elasticsearch, NLP/ML libraries and unstructured data sets on the hack/reduce cluster. It will be very open ended and all about seeing what type of applications or insights people can achieve with these tools in that short time frame.

Â
item.name: Elasticsearch Boston NLP/ML Hackday
